person.persName: John G. Kyle (Mercer County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of Andrew G. Kyle and Jane H. Glover Kyle. Educated at Transylvania University and withdrew due to health issues. Studied law in Mercer County in 1860. Graduated from the Law School of Louisville in 1862. Began practice in Harrodsburg, Kentucky. Judge of the Harrodsburg Police Court. Colonel of the Mercer County Militia during the Civil War. Member of the Episcopal Church.
